<title
    level="1"
    right="Weapon 0"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bow Staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=344)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Combination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=417" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 31 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
**Price** 8 gp

**Bulk** 1
</row>

**Hands** 1+

**Category** Martial

</column>

---

The bow staff is a [whipstaff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=308) with a retracting spool of wire inside a metal cap on one end and a hooked protrusion on the other. A wielder trained in the weapon's use can quickly spool and attach or detach the wire to transition the weapon between bow and staff functionality.

<title level="2">Melee</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Finesse" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=179" />
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
<trait label="Parry" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=190" />
<trait label="Sweep" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=194" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Damage** 1d6 B

**Group** [Club](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=5)

</column>

<title level="2">Ranged</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Deadly d8" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=174" />
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Damage** 1d6 P

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 80 ft.

**Reload** 0
</row>

**Group** [Bow](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=3)

**Ammunition** [Arrows](/Weapons.aspx?ID=83)

</column>

<title level="2">Critical Specialization Effects</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 283 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

Certain feats, class features, weapon runes, and other effects can grant you additional benefits when you make a Strike with certain weapons and get a critical success. This is called a critical specialization effect. The exact effect depends on which weapon group your weapon belongs to, as listed below. You can always decide not to add the critical specialization effect of your weapon.

[Click here for the full rules on Critical Specialization Effects](/Rules.aspx?ID=235).

<document level="2" id="weapon-group-3" />
